fields.summary: AM heartbeat stuck when responseId overflows MAX_INT

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

fields.summary: TestAMRMProxy is failing with invalid request

comments.body:
This was broken by YARN-6640.  After that change the response ID for the initial allocation request must be zero, and these unit tests were sending a response ID of 1 instead.

TestDistributedScheduling was failing with the same type of error since it leverages the same code to create an allocation request.

Attaching a patch that changes BaseAMRMProxyE2ETest to use an initial allocate ID of zero just like AMRMClient and RMContainerRequestor.

[~leftnoteasy] would you mind taking a look?
